product_name: Tretorn Skerry Reslig Rain Boots - Women's - 2011 Closeout
long_description: Brighten up a rainy day with the Tretorn Skerry Reslig rain boots. Offering everyday comfort and waterproof protection in a classic, shiny style, they'll help you through even the deepest puddles. Tall natural rubber uppers form a tough waterproof barrier to keep out slush and puddles. Leather loop at top of boots gives you leverage to slip feet comfortably inside and tuck in your pants. Polyester microfleece linings are soft to the touch, wick moisture to regulate foot temperature and increase insulation in cold weather. Rubber midsoles absorb shock, cushion feet and provide gentle support. Tretorn Skerry Reslig rain boots feature gum rubber outsoles to provide traction on a variety of surfaces. Closeout.
short_description: Brighten up a rainy day with the Tretorn Skerry Reslig rain boots. Offering everyday comfort and waterproof protection in a classic, shiny style, they'll help you through even the deepest puddles.
